N <- 40 # number of sampled points
K <- 3  # number of knots

piece.formula <- function(var.name, knots) {
  formula.sign <- rep(" - ", length(knots))
  formula.sign[knots < 0] <- " + "
  paste(var.name, "+",
        paste("I(pmax(", var.name, formula.sign, abs(knots), ", 0))",
              collapse = " + ", sep=""))
}
